Description: Full BaaS platform for fintechs - accounts, cards, money movement, compliance
Key Features: APIs, Ledger, Console, KYC/KYB, Payment rails, Fraud monitoring, Bank matching network
Positioning vs FINORI: Direct competitor - middleware between fintech and bank. FINORI differentiates with 'bank comfort' approach

Description: 'Bank Direct' embedded banking platform
Key Features: Direct bank relationships, Embedded banking, Referral relationships, Corporate API banking, 15+ bank network
Positioning vs FINORI: Direct competitor. Claims 'most banks choose us'. FINORI can compete on foreign fintech expertise

Description: Full payment infrastructure for community banks. Braid Payment Core is standalone (no legacy core integration). 'Not BaaS/middleware' - dedicated instance in bank's cloud.
Target ICP: Community banks wanting to become digital payment powerhouses
Key Features: Payment Core, Ledger (Fiat+Token), ACH/Wire/Card/RTP/FedNow, Issuer Processor, DeFi Bridge, Compliance (PCI/NACHA/BSA-AML/OFAC)
Pricing Model: Software licensing + Processing + Revenue share (6mo sales support)
Positioning vs FINORI: Potential PARTNER not competitor. Braid enables banks; FINORI prepares fintechs. Complementary.

Description: Embedded finance platform - 'Ready-to-Launch' or 'Custom' options
Key Features: Accounts, Cards, Money movement, Ready-in-3-weeks or Custom in 6 weeks, $50B+ annual volume
Positioning vs FINORI: Competitor. Known for fast launch times. FINORI differentiates on compliance depth for foreign entities

Description: Identity & fraud prevention platform, 700+ FI customers
Key Features: KYC/KYB, AML, Fraud, Credit underwriting, Transaction monitoring, 200+ data partners
Positioning vs FINORI: Complementary - potential partner for FINORI's compliance stack

Description: Business identity platform - KYB, verification, credit assessment
Key Features: KYB, Business verification, Credit assessment, Lien filing, Direct gov connections
Positioning vs FINORI: Complementary - potential partner for business verification

Description: AI risk platform for fraud, credit, compliance

Positioning vs FINORI: Complementary - especially Sponsor Bank OS could be partner or competitor

Description: Enterprise-grade embedded finance, focus on credit/cards
Key Features: Consumer/commercial cards, Credit programs, Underwriting, Card issuing, Multi-bank approach
Positioning vs FINORI: Competitor in card/credit space. FINORI differentiates on full-stack banking + foreign focus

Description: Money movement APIs - ACH, RTP, wires, stablecoins
Key Features: Payment APIs, Ledgers, Multi-bank integrations, Real-time tracking
Positioning vs FINORI: Complementary - payment infrastructure partner option

Description: Nationally chartered bank built for developers, 'platform bank'
Key Features: Direct Fed access, Bank accounts, Payments, Cards, Lending, $2T+ annual volume, 99.999% uptime
Positioning vs FINORI: Different model - Column IS the bank. FINORI helps fintechs connect to banks like Column

Description: Developer-first card issuing, processor-agnostic
Key Features: Virtual/physical cards, Multi-currency, Authorization decisioning, Settlement API
Positioning vs FINORI: Complementary - card issuing partner. FINORI could bundle or compete

Description: Enterprise card issuing platform, $290B+ processed 2024
Key Features: Card issuing, Processing, Real-time controls, Global (40+ countries)
Positioning vs FINORI: Large enterprise competitor in card space

Description: Financial technology platform - cards, deposits, payments, lending
Key Features: Card issuing, Payment hub, Digital banking, Core banking, 100M+ accounts
Positioning vs FINORI: Competitor - full stack. Owned by SoFi creates potential conflict

Description: Embedded financial services for platforms (via Fifth Third Bank)

Positioning vs FINORI: Competitor for platforms already on Stripe. FINORI differentiates on standalone relationships

Description: Embedded banking platform with 'built-in compliance'
Key Features: Accounts, Payments, Card issuance, Compliance-first architecture, $11B+ processed
Positioning vs FINORI: Competitor. 'Built-in compliance' positioning similar to FINORI's compliance focus

Description: Embedded financial solutions for B2B SaaS, UK/EU focused
Key Features: Accounts, Cards, Pre-approved payment models, UK FCA regulated
Positioning vs FINORI: Different geography. Reference for European approach. Could be expansion partner

Description: Global real-time payments infrastructure

Positioning vs FINORI: Competitor for cross-border. FINORI could partner for global reach or compete on US-entry focus

Description: API-based sponsor bank, pioneered fintech banking

Positioning vs FINORI: Partner-type relationship typically. Cross River could be FINORI's bank partner

Description: Unified risk & compliance operations platform

Description: Enterprise client lifecycle management, KYC/AML

Description: National bank focused on 'Financial Inclusion for All'

Description: Full-service payments, lending, banking provider since 2001
